bug-buzz.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

rage-powder.name: rage-powder
rage-powder.effect:
Until the end of this turn, any moves that opposing Pokémon target solely at the user's ally will instead target the user.  If both Pokémon on the same side of the field use this move on the same turn, the Pokémon that uses it last will become the target.

This effect takes priority over lightning rod and storm drain.

If the user's ally switches out, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with pursuit.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
rage-powder.short_effect: Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn.

quiver-dance.name: quiver-dance
quiver-dance.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
quiver-dance.short_effect: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

struggle-bug.name: struggle-bug
struggle-bug.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
struggle-bug.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.

draining-kiss.name: draining-kiss
draining-kiss.effect: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
draining-kiss.short_effect: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

infestation.name: infestation
infestation.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
infestation.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

pollen-puff.name: pollen-puff
pollen-puff.effect: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage.  If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.
pollen-puff.short_effect: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.

poison-sting.name: poison-sting
poison-sting.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
poison-sting.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

fury-attack.name: fury-attack
fury-attack.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

twineedle.name: twineedle
twineedle.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
twineedle.short_effect: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

pin-missile.name: pin-missile
pin-missile.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

peck.name: peck
peck.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

agility.name: agility
agility.effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
agility.short_effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

focus-energy.name: focus-energy
focus-energy.effect:
User's critical hit rate is two levels higher until it leaves the field.  If the user has already used focus energy since entering the field, this move will fail.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
focus-energy.short_effect: Increases the user's chance to score a critical hit.

pursuit.name: pursuit
pursuit.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target attempts to switch out this turn before the user acts, this move hits the target before it leaves and has double power.

This effect can still hit a Pokémon that switches out when it has a substitute up or when an ally has used follow me.
pursuit.short_effect: Has double power against, and can hit, Pokémon attempting to switch out.

endeavor.name: endeavor
endeavor.effect: Inflicts exactly enough damage to lower the target's HP to equal the user's.  If the target's HP is not higher than the user's, this move has no effect.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.  This effect counts as damage for moves that respond to damage.
endeavor.short_effect: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.

payback.name: payback
payback.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
payback.short_effect: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.

assurance.name: assurance
assurance.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
assurance.short_effect: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

toxic-spikes.name: toxic-spikes
toxic-spikes.effect:
Scatters poisoned spikes around the opposing field, which poison opposing Pokémon that enter the field.  A second layer of these spikes may be laid down, in which case Pokémon will be badly poisoned instead.  Pokémon immune to either ground moves or being poisoned are immune to this effect.  Pokémon otherwise immune to ground moves are affected during gravity.

If a poison Pokémon not immune to ground moves enters a field covered with poisoned spikes, the spikes are removed.

rapid spin will remove this effect from its user's side of the field.  defog will remove this effect from its target's side of the field.

This move does not trigger synchronize, unless the Pokémon with synchronize was forced to enter the field by another effect such as roar.

Pokémon entering the field due to baton pass are not affected by this effect.
toxic-spikes.short_effect: Scatters poisoned spikes, poisoning opposing Pokémon that switch in.

x-scissor.name: x-scissor
x-scissor.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

drill-run.name: drill-run
drill-run.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
drill-run.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

fell-stinger.name: fell-stinger
fell-stinger.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
fell-stinger.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.

laser-focus.name: laser-focus
laser-focus.effect: The user's next move will result in a critical hit.
laser-focus.short_effect: Guarantees a critical hit with the user's next move.

throat-chop.name: throat-chop
throat-chop.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Silences the target for two turns, preventing it from using any sound-based moves.
throat-chop.short_effect: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

sand-attack.name: sand-attack
sand-attack.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
sand-attack.short_effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

quick-attack.name: quick-attack
quick-attack.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

mirror-move.name: mirror-move
mirror-move.effect:
Uses the last move targeted at the user by a Pokémon still on the field.  A move counts as targeting the user even if it hit multiple Pokémon, as long as the user was one of them; however, moves targeting the field itself do not count.  If the user has not been targeted by an appropriate move since entering the field, or if no Pokémon that targeted the user remains on the field, this move will fail.

Moves that failed, missed, had no effect, or were blocked are still copied.

Assist moves, time-delayed moves, “meta” moves that operate on other moves/Pokémon/abilities, and some other special moves cannot be copied and are ignored; if the last move to hit the user was such a move, the previous move will be used instead.  The full list of ignored moves is: acid armor, acupressure, after you, agility, ally switch, amnesia, aqua ring, aromatherapy, aromatic mist, assist, autotomize, barrier, baton pass, belch, belly drum, bide, bulk up, calm mind, camouflage, celebrate, charge, coil, conversion, conversion 2, copycat, cosmic power, cotton guard, counter, crafty shield, curse, defend order, defense curl, destiny bond, detect, doom desire, double team, dragon dance, electric terrain, endure, final gambit, flower shield, focus energy, focus punch, follow me, future sight, geomancy, grassy terrain, gravity, growth, grudge, guard split, hail, happy hour, harden, haze, heal bell, heal order, heal pulse, healing wish, helping hand, hold hands, hone claws, howl, imprison, ingrain, ion deluge, iron defense, kings shield, light screen, lucky chant, lunar dance, magic coat, magnet rise, magnetic flux, mat block, me first, meditate, metronome, milk drink, mimic, minimize, mirror coat, mirror move, mist, misty terrain, moonlight, morning sun, mud sport, nasty plot, nature power, perish song, power split, power trick, protect, psych up, quick guard, quiver dance, rage powder, rain dance, recover, recycle, reflect, reflect type, refresh, rest, rock polish, role play, roost, rototiller, safeguard, sandstorm, shadow blast, shadow bolt, shadow half, shadow rush, shadow shed, shadow sky, shadow storm, shadow wave, sharpen, shell smash, shift gear, sketch, slack off, sleep talk, snatch, soft boiled, spikes, spiky shield, spit up, splash, stealth rock, sticky web, stockpile, struggle, substitute, sunny day, swallow, swords dance, synthesis, tail glow, tailwind, teleport, toxic spikes, transform, water sport, wide guard, wish, withdraw and work up.

This move cannot be selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk, nor forced by encore.
mirror-move.short_effect: Uses the target's last used move.

sky-attack.name: sky-attack
sky-attack.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.  Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
sky-attack.short_effect: User charges for one turn before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

feint-attack.name: feint-attack
feint-attack.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

detect.name: detect
detect.effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
detect.short_effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

uproar.name: uproar
uproar.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for 2–5 turns, selected at random.  All Pokémon on the field wake up, and none can fall to sleep until the lock-in ends.

Pokémon cannot use rest during this effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
uproar.short_effect: Forced to use this move for several turns.  Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time.

feather-dance.name: feather-dance
feather-dance.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
feather-dance.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

pluck.name: pluck
pluck.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
pluck.short_effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

brave-bird.name: brave-bird
brave-bird.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
brave-bird.short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

thunderbolt.name: thunderbolt
thunderbolt.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderbolt.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunder.name: thunder
thunder.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
thunder.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

screech.name: screech
screech.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.
screech.short_effect: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.

hyper-fang.name: hyper-fang
hyper-fang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
hyper-fang.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

super-fang.name: super-fang
super-fang.effect: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target's remaining HP.
super-fang.short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target's HP.

flame-wheel.name: flame-wheel
flame-wheel.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
flame-wheel.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

reversal.name: reversal
reversal.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
reversal.short_effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.

taunt.name: taunt
taunt.effect:
Target is forced to only use damaging moves for the next 3–5 turns, selected at random.  Moves that select other moves not known in advance do not count as damaging.

assist, copycat, me first, metronome, mirror move, and sleep talk do not directly inflict damage and thus may not be used.

bide, counter, endeavor, metal burst, and mirror coat are allowed.
taunt.short_effect: For the next few turns, the target can only use damaging moves.

revenge.name: revenge
revenge.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target damaged the user this turn and was the last to do so, this move has double power.

pain split does not count as damaging the user.
revenge.short_effect: Inflicts double damage if the user takes damage before attacking this turn.

covet.name: covet
covet.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding an item and the user is not, the user will permanently take the item.  Damage is still inflicted if an item cannot be taken.

Pokémon with sticky hold or multitype are immune to the item theft effect.

The target cannot recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

shock-wave.name: shock-wave
shock-wave.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

me-first.name: me-first
me-first.effect:
If the target has selected a damaging move this turn, the user will copy that move and use it against the target, with a 50% increase in power.

If the target moves before the user, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
me-first.short_effect: Uses the target's move against it before it attacks, with power increased by half.

last-resort.name: last-resort
last-resort.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  This move can only be used if each of the user's other moves has been used at least once since the user entered the field.  If this is the user's only move, this move will fail.
last-resort.short_effect: Can only be used after all of the user's other moves have been used.

sucker-punch.name: sucker-punch
sucker-punch.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

This move is not affected by iron fist.
sucker-punch.short_effect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

charge-beam.name: charge-beam
charge-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
charge-beam.short_effect: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.

retaliate.name: retaliate
retaliate.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
retaliate.short_effect: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.

final-gambit.name: final-gambit
final-gambit.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.
final-gambit.short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.

wild-charge.name: wild-charge
wild-charge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
wild-charge.short_effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

drill-peck.name: drill-peck
drill-peck.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

tri-attack.name: tri-attack
tri-attack.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.  One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
tri-attack.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

astonish.name: astonish
astonish.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
astonish.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

slam.name: slam
slam.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

wrap.name: wrap
wrap.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
wrap.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

disable.name: disable
disable.effect: Disables the target's last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed,  if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.
disable.short_effect: Disables the target's last used move for 1-8 turns.

acid.name: acid
acid.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
acid.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

leech-life.name: leech-life
leech-life.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
leech-life.short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

spite.name: spite
spite.effect: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
spite.short_effect: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.

stockpile.name: stockpile
stockpile.effect:
Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.  Stores energy for use with spit up and swallow.  Up to three levels of energy can be stored, and all are lost if the user leaves the field.  Energy is still stored even if the stat boosts cannot be applied.

If the user uses baton pass, the stat boosts are passed as normal, but the stored energy is not.
stockpile.short_effect: Stores energy up to three times for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

spit-up.name: spit-up
spit-up.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power is equal to 100 times the amount of energy stored by stockpile.  Ignores the random factor in the damage formula.  Stored energy is consumed, and the user's Defense and Special Defense are reset to what they would be if stockpile had not been used.  If the user has no energy stored, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
spit-up.short_effect: Power is 100 times the amount of energy Stockpiled.

swallow.name: swallow
swallow.effect: Heals the user depending on the amount of energy stored by stockpile: 1/4 its max HP after one use, 1/2 its max HP after two uses, or fully after three uses.  Stored energy is consumed, and the user's Defense and Special Defense are reset to what they would be if stockpile had not been used.  If the user has no energy stored, this move will fail.
swallow.short_effect: Recovers 1/4 HP after one Stockpile, 1/2 HP after two Stockpiles, or full HP after three Stockpiles.

torment.name: torment
torment.effect:
Prevents the target from attempting to use the same move twice in a row.  When the target leaves the field, this effect ends.

If the target is forced to attempt a repeated move due to choice band, choice scarf, choice specs, disable, encore, taunt, only having PP remaining for one move, or any other effect, the target will use struggle instead.  The target is then free to use the forced move next turn, as it didn't use that move this turn.
torment.short_effect: Prevents the target from using the same move twice in a row.

snatch.name: snatch
snatch.effect:
The next time a Pokémon uses a beneficial move on itself or itself and its ally this turn, the user of this move will steal the move and use it itself.  Moves which may be stolen by this move are identified by the "snatchable" flag.

If two Pokémon use this move on the same turn, the faster Pokémon will steal the first beneficial move, and the slower Pokémon will then steal it again—thus, only the slowest Pokémon using this move ultimately gains a stolen move's effect.

If the user steals psych up, it will target the Pokémon that used psych up.  If the user was the original target of psych up, and the Pokémon that originally used it's affected by pressure, it will only lose 1 PP.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
snatch.short_effect: Steals the target's move, if it's self-targeted.

poison-fang.name: poison-fang
poison-fang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poison-fang.short_effect: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.

poison-tail.name: poison-tail
poison-tail.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
poison-tail.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

gastro-acid.name: gastro-acid
gastro-acid.effect:
The target's ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
gastro-acid.short_effect: Nullifies target's ability until it leaves battle.

switcheroo.name: switcheroo
switcheroo.effect:
User and target permanently swap held items.  Works even if one of the Pokémon isn't holding anything.  If either Pokémon is holding mail, this move will fail.

If either Pokémon has multitype or sticky hold, this move will fail.

If this move results in a Pokémon obtaining choice band, choice scarf, or choice specs, and that Pokémon was the latter of the pair to move this turn, then the move it used this turn becomes its chosen forced move.  This applies even if both Pokémon had a choice item before this move was used.  If the first of the two Pokémon gains a choice item, it may select whatever choice move it wishes next turn.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

mud-bomb.name: mud-bomb
mud-bomb.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
mud-bomb.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

gunk-shot.name: gunk-shot
gunk-shot.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
gunk-shot.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

sludge-wave.name: sludge-wave
sludge-wave.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
sludge-wave.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

coil.name: coil
coil.effect: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
coil.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.

snarl.name: snarl
snarl.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
snarl.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.

belch.name: belch
belch.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Can only be used if the user has eaten a berry since the beginning of the battle.

After the user eats a berry, it may use this move any number of times until the end of the battle, even if it switches out.  Eating a held berry, eating a berry via bug bite or pluck, or being the target of a Flung berry will enable this move.  Feeding a Pokémon a berry from the bag or using natural gift will not.

If the trainer chooses this move when it cannot be used, the choice is rejected outright and the trainer must choose another move.
belch.short_effect: Can only be used after the user has eaten a berry.

psychic-fangs.name: psychic-fangs
psychic-fangs.effect: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target's side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.

skitter-smack.name: skitter-smack
skitter-smack.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

lash-out.name: lash-out
lash-out.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

pain-split.name: pain-split
pain-split.effect:
Changes the user's and target's remaining HP to the average of their current remaining HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect does not count as inflicting damage for other moves and effects that respond to damage taken.

This effect fails against a substitute.
pain-split.short_effect: Sets the user's and targets's HP to the average of their current HP.

thunder-fang.name: thunder-fang
thunder-fang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
thunder-fang.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

ice-fang.name: ice-fang
ice-fang.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
ice-fang.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

pay-day.name: pay-day
pay-day.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user's level in extra money for each time this move was used.
pay-day.short_effect: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user's level.

double-kick.name: double-kick
double-kick.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.

thunder-shock.name: thunder-shock
thunder-shock.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
thunder-shock.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

zap-cannon.name: zap-cannon
zap-cannon.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
zap-cannon.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

spark.name: spark
spark.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
spark.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

encore.name: encore
encore.effect:
The next 4–8 times (selected at random) the target attempts to move, it is forced to repeat its last used move.  If the selected move allows the trainer to select a target, an opponent will be selected at random each turn.  If the target is prevented from using the selected move by some other effect, struggle will be used instead.  This effect ends if the selected move runs out of PP.

If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, if it does not know the selected move, or if the selected move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.  If the target's last used move was encore, mimic, mirror move, sketch, struggle, or transform, this move will fail.
encore.short_effect: Forces the target to repeat its last used move every turn for 2 to 6 turns.

charge.name: charge
charge.effect: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
charge.short_effect: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  User's Electric moves have doubled power next turn.

fake-tears.name: fake-tears
fake-tears.effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
fake-tears.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

volt-tackle.name: volt-tackle
volt-tackle.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
volt-tackle.short_effect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

calm-mind.name: calm-mind
calm-mind.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage each.
calm-mind.short_effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage.

feint.name: feint
feint.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

magnet-rise.name: magnet-rise
magnet-rise.effect:
For five turns, the user is immune to ground moves.

If the user is under the effect of ingrain or has levitate, this move will fail.

This effect is temporarily disabled by and cannot be used during gravity.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
magnet-rise.short_effect: User is immune to Ground moves and effects for five turns.

nasty-plot.name: nasty-plot
nasty-plot.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack by two stages.
nasty-plot.short_effect: Raises the user's Special Attack by two stages.

discharge.name: discharge
discharge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
discharge.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

electro-ball.name: electro-ball
electro-ball.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's Speed compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User's Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target's Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target's Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target's Speed  |   150
electro-ball.short_effect: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.

volt-switch.name: volt-switch
volt-switch.effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain's effect will end.
volt-switch.short_effect: User must switch out after attacking.

disarming-voice.name: disarming-voice
disarming-voice.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion.

play-rough.name: play-rough
play-rough.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
play-rough.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.

play-nice.name: play-nice
play-nice.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
play-nice.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

eerie-impulse.name: eerie-impulse
eerie-impulse.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.
eerie-impulse.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.

electric-terrain.name: electric-terrain
electric-terrain.effect:
For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
electric-terrain.short_effect: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

nuzzle.name: nuzzle
nuzzle.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
nuzzle.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

rising-voltage.name: rising-voltage
rising-voltage.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

speed-swap.name: speed-swap
speed-swap.effect: Exchanges the original Speed stats of the user and target.
speed-swap.short_effect: Exchanges the user's Speed with the target's.

low-kick.name: low-kick
low-kick.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target's weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120
low-kick.short_effect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

spikes.name: spikes
spikes.effect:
Scatters spikes around the opposing field, which damage opposing Pokémon that enter the field for 1/8 of their max HP.  Pokémon immune to ground moves are immune to this damage, except during gravity.  Up to three layers of spikes may be laid down, adding 1/16 to the damage done: two layers of spikes damage for 3/16 max HP, and three layers damage for 1/4 max HP.

wonder guard does not block damage from this effect.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user's side of the field.  defog removes this effect from its target's side of the field.
spikes.short_effect: Scatters Spikes, hurting opposing Pokémon that switch in.

magnitude.name: magnitude
magnitude.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power is selected at random between 10 and 150, with an average of 71:

Magnitude | Power | Chance
--------: | ----: | -----:
        4 |    10 |     5%
        5 |    30 |    10%
        6 |    50 |    20%
        7 |    70 |    30%
        8 |    90 |    20%
        9 |   110 |    10%
       10 |   150 |     5%

This move has double power against Pokémon currently underground due to dig.

crush-claw.name: crush-claw
crush-claw.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
crush-claw.short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

sand-tomb.name: sand-tomb
sand-tomb.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
sand-tomb.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

night-slash.name: night-slash
night-slash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
night-slash.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

stone-edge.name: stone-edge
stone-edge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
stone-edge.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

stealth-rock.name: stealth-rock
stealth-rock.effect:
Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP.  This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon's susceptibility to rock moves.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user's side of the field.
stealth-rock.short_effect: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

chip-away.name: chip-away
chip-away.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.

rototiller.name: rototiller
rototiller.effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
rototiller.short_effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.

high-horsepower.name: high-horsepower
high-horsepower.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

steel-roller.name: steel-roller
steel-roller.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flatter.name: flatter
flatter.effect: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.
flatter.short_effect: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target.

venom-drench.name: venom-drench
venom-drench.effect: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
venom-drench.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.

horn-drill.name: horn-drill
horn-drill.effect:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.

superpower.name: superpower
superpower.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.
superpower.short_effect: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

rock-blast.name: rock-blast
rock-blast.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

hex.name: hex
hex.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a major status ailment, this move has double power.
hex.short_effect: Has double power if the target has a major status ailment.

quash.name: quash
quash.effect: Forces the target to act last this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.  If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
quash.short_effect: Makes the target act last this turn.

horn-attack.name: horn-attack
horn-attack.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

thrash.name: thrash
thrash.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
thrash.short_effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

head-smash.name: head-smash
head-smash.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
head-smash.short_effect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.

smart-strike.name: smart-strike
smart-strike.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

megahorn.name: megahorn
megahorn.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

pound.name: pound
pound.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

double-slap.name: double-slap
double-slap.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

night-shade.name: night-shade
night-shade.effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
night-shade.short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

minimize.name: minimize
minimize.effect:
Raises the user's evasion by two stages.

stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
minimize.short_effect: Raises the user's evasion by two stages.

metronome.name: metronome
metronome.effect:
Selects any move at random and uses it.  Moves the user already knows are not eligible.  Assist, meta, protection, and reflection moves are also not eligible; specifically, assist, chatter, copycat, counter, covet, destiny bond, detect, endure, feint, focus punch, follow me, helping hand, me first, metronome, mimic, mirror coat, mirror move, protect, quick guard, sketch, sleep talk, snatch, struggle, switcheroo, thief, trick, and wide guard will not be selected by this move.

This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
metronome.short_effect: Randomly selects and uses any move in the game.

soft-boiled.name: soft-boiled
soft-boiled.effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
soft-boiled.short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

splash.name: splash
splash.effect:
Does nothing.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

heal-bell.name: heal-bell
heal-bell.effect: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user's party.
heal-bell.short_effect: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

present.name: present
present.effect:
Randomly uses one of the following effects.

Effect                                             | Chance
-------------------------------------------------- | -----:
Inflicts regular damage with 40 power  |    40%
Inflicts regular damage with 80 power  |    30%
Inflicts regular damage with 120 power |    10%
Heals the target for 1/4 its max HP    |    20%

On average, this move inflicts regular damage with 52 power and heals the target for 1/20 its max HP.
present.short_effect: Randomly inflicts damage with power from 40 to 120 or heals the target for 1/4 its max HP.

moonlight.name: moonlight
moonlight.effect:
Heals the user for half its max HP.

During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
moonlight.short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

trick.name: trick
trick.effect:
User and target permanently swap held items.  Works even if one of the Pokémon isn't holding anything.  If either Pokémon is holding mail, this move will fail.

If either Pokémon has multitype or sticky hold, this move will fail.

If this move results in a Pokémon obtaining choice band, choice scarf, or choice specs, and that Pokémon was the latter of the pair to move this turn, then the move it used this turn becomes its chosen forced move.  This applies even if both Pokémon had a choice item before this move was used.  If the first of the two Pokémon gains a choice item, it may select whatever choice move it wishes next turn.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

role-play.name: role-play
role-play.effect:
User's ability is replaced with the target's until the user leaves the field.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

If the target has flower gift, forecast, illusion, imposter, multitype, stance change, trace, wonder guard, or zen mode, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.

wish.name: wish
wish.effect: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP.  If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user's max HP.  If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
wish.short_effect: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.

magic-coat.name: magic-coat
magic-coat.effect:
The first non-damaging move targeting the user this turn that inflicts major status effects, stat changes, or trapping effects will be reflected at its user.

defog, memento, and teeter dance are not reflected.

attract, flatter, gastro acid, leech seed, swagger, worry seed, and yawn are reflected.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
magic-coat.short_effect: Reflects back the first effect move used on the user this turn.

recycle.name: recycle
recycle.effect:
User recovers the last item consumed by the user or a Pokémon in its position on the field.  The item must be used again before it can be recovered by this move again.  If the user is holding an item, this move fails.

Items taken or given away by covet, knock off, switcheroo, thief, or trick may not be recovered.
recycle.short_effect: User recovers the item it last used up.

imprison.name: imprison
imprison.effect: Prevents any Pokémon on the opposing side of the field from using any move the user knows until the user leaves the field.  This effect is live; if the user obtains new moves while on the field, these moves become restricted.  If no opposing Pokémon knows any of the user's moves when this move is used, this move will fail.
imprison.short_effect: Prevents the target from using any moves that the user also knows.

hyper-voice.name: hyper-voice
hyper-voice.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

meteor-mash.name: meteor-mash
meteor-mash.effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack one stage.
meteor-mash.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by one stage.

tickle.name: tickle
tickle.effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by one stage.
tickle.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by one stage.

cosmic-power.name: cosmic-power
cosmic-power.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
cosmic-power.short_effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

bounce.name: bounce
bounce.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User bounces high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, and twister still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
bounce.short_effect: User bounces high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

gravity.name: gravity
gravity.effect:
For five turns (including this one), all immunities to ground moves are disabled.  For the duration of this effect, the evasion of every Pokémon on the field is lowered by two stages.  Cancels the effects of bounce, fly, and sky drop.

Specifically, flying Pokémon and those with levitate or that have used magnet rise are no longer immune to ground attacks, arena trap, spikes, or toxic spikes.

bounce, fly, sky drop, high jump kick, jump kick, and splash cannot be used while this move is in effect.

*Bug*: If this move is used during a double or triple battle while Pokémon are under the effect of sky drop, Sky Drop's effect is not correctly canceled on its target, and it remains high in the air indefinitely.  As Sky Drop prevents the target from acting, the only way to subsequently remove it from the field is to faint it.
gravity.short_effect: Disables moves and immunities that involve flying or levitating for five turns.

wake-up-slap.name: wake-up-slap
wake-up-slap.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
wake-up-slap.short_effect: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

healing-wish.name: healing-wish
healing-wish.effect: User faints.  Its replacement's HP is fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.  If the replacement Pokémon is immediately fainted by a switch-in effect, the next replacement is healed by this move instead.
healing-wish.short_effect: User faints.  Its replacement has its HP fully restored and any major status effect removed.

lucky-chant.name: lucky-chant
lucky-chant.effect: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
lucky-chant.short_effect: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.

copycat.name: copycat
copycat.effect:
Uses the last move that was used successfully by any Pokémon, including the user.

This move cannot copy itself, nor roar nor whirlwind.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
copycat.short_effect: Uses the target's last used move.

drain-punch.name: drain-punch
drain-punch.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
drain-punch.short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

wonder-room.name: wonder-room
wonder-room.effect: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
wonder-room.short_effect: All Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.

psyshock.name: psyshock
psyshock.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.
psyshock.short_effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

telekinesis.name: telekinesis
telekinesis.effect:
For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage.  Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect.

This effect is removed by gravity.  If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.
telekinesis.short_effect: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.

after-you.name: after-you
after-you.effect:
The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.
If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
after-you.short_effect: Makes the target act next this turn.

stored-power.name: stored-power
stored-power.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user's stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move's power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move's power is 31×.
stored-power.short_effect: Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.

ally-switch.name: ally-switch
ally-switch.effect: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
ally-switch.short_effect: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.

heal-pulse.name: heal-pulse
heal-pulse.effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.
heal-pulse.short_effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.

bestow.name: bestow
bestow.effect: Transfers the user's held item to the target.  If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
bestow.short_effect: Gives the user's held item to the target.

misty-terrain.name: misty-terrain
misty-terrain.effect:
For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power.

Changes nature power to moonblast.
misty-terrain.short_effect: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.

fairy-wind.name: fairy-wind
fairy-wind.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moonblast.name: moonblast
moonblast.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
moonblast.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.

dazzling-gleam.name: dazzling-gleam
dazzling-gleam.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

baby-doll-eyes.name: baby-doll-eyes
baby-doll-eyes.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
baby-doll-eyes.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

spotlight.name: spotlight
spotlight.effect: For the duration of the turn, if the target is also a valid target for a move used by one of its opponents, that move will target it instead.
spotlight.short_effect: Forces the target's opponents to aim at the target for the rest of the turn.

meteor-beam.name: meteor-beam
meteor-beam.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

misty-explosion.name: misty-explosion
misty-explosion.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

future-sight.name: future-sight
future-sight.effect:
Inflicts typeless regular damage at the end of the third turn, starting with this one.  This move cannot score a critical hit.  If the target switches out, its replacement will be hit instead.  Damage is calculated at the time this move is used; stat changes and switching out during the delay won't change the damage inflicted.  No move with this effect can be used against the same target again until after the end of the third turn.

This effect breaks through wonder guard.

If the target is protected by protect or detect on the turn this move is used, this move will fail.  However, the damage on the third turn will break through protection.

The damage is applied at the end of the turn, so it ignores endure and focus sash.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
future-sight.short_effect: Hits the target two turns later.

memento.name: memento
memento.effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by two stages.  User faints.
memento.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by two stages.  User faints.

grudge.name: grudge
grudge.effect: If the user faints before it next acts, the move that fainted it will have its PP dropped to 0.  End-of-turn damage does not trigger this effect.
grudge.short_effect: If the user faints this turn, the PP of the move that fainted it drops to 0.

extrasensory.name: extrasensory
extrasensory.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

howl.name: howl
howl.effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
howl.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.

power-swap.name: power-swap
power-swap.effect: User swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat modifiers modifiers with the target.
power-swap.short_effect: User swaps Attack and Special Attack changes with the target.

foul-play.name: foul-play
foul-play.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using the target's attacking stat rather than the user's.
foul-play.short_effect: Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat.

tail-slap.name: tail-slap
tail-slap.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

burning-jealousy.name: burning-jealousy
burning-jealousy.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

self-destruct.name: self-destruct
self-destruct.effect: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.

magic-room.name: magic-room
magic-room.effect: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
magic-room.short_effect: Negates held items for five turns.

expanding-force.name: expanding-force
expanding-force.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

absorb.name: absorb
absorb.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
absorb.short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

mean-look.name: mean-look
mean-look.effect:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
mean-look.short_effect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

cross-poison.name: cross-poison
cross-poison.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
cross-poison.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

quick-guard.name: quick-guard
quick-guard.effect:
Moves with priority greater than 0 will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
quick-guard.short_effect: Prevents any priority moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.

strength-sap.name: strength-sap
strength-sap.effect:
Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.  Heals the user by the target's current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move's Attack-lowering effect.

If the target's Attack is already at -6, this move will fail.  In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.
strength-sap.short_effect: Heals the user by the target's current Attack stat and lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

aromatherapy.name: aromatherapy
aromatherapy.effect: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user's party.
aromatherapy.short_effect: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

solar-blade.name: solar-blade
solar-blade.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During sunny day, the charge turn is skipped.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
solar-blade.short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

corrosive-gas.name: corrosive-gas
corrosive-gas.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

wide-guard.name: wide-guard
wide-guard.effect:
Moves with multiple targets will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
wide-guard.short_effect: Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.

morning-sun.name: morning-sun
morning-sun.effect:
Heals the user for half its max HP.

During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
morning-sun.short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

lunge.name: lunge
lunge.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
lunge.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

assist.name: assist
assist.effect:
Uses a move from another Pokémon in the user's party, both selected at random.  Moves from fainted Pokémon can be used.  If there are no eligible Pokémon or moves, this move will fail.

This move will not select assist, chatter, circle throw, copycat, counter, covet, destiny bond, detect, dig, dive, dragon tail, endure, feint, fly focus punch, follow me, helping hand, me first, metronome, mimic, mirror coat, mirror move, phantom force protect, quick guard, roar shadow force, sketch, sleep talk, snatch, struggle, switcheroo, thief, trick, whirlwind, or wide guard.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by metronome or sleep talk.
assist.short_effect: Randomly selects and uses one of the trainer's other Pokémon's moves.

odor-sleuth.name: odor-sleuth
odor-sleuth.effect: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
odor-sleuth.short_effect: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it's a Ghost.

punishment.name: punishment
punishment.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power starts at 60 and is increased by 20 for every stage any of the target's stats has been raised, capping at 200.  Accuracy and evasion modifiers do not increase this move's power.
punishment.short_effect: Power increases against targets with more raised stats, up to a maximum of 200.

power-gem.name: power-gem
power-gem.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

embargo.name: embargo
embargo.effect:
Target cannot use its held item for five turns.  If the target leaves the field, this effect ends.

If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used.  If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail.

This effect is passed by baton pass.

cross-chop.name: cross-chop
cross-chop.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
cross-chop.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

water-sport.name: water-sport
water-sport.effect: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

vacuum-wave.name: vacuum-wave
vacuum-wave.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

synchronoise.name: synchronoise
synchronoise.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
synchronoise.short_effect: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

soak.name: soak
soak.effect: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field.  If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
soak.short_effect: Changes the target's type to Water.

low-sweep.name: low-sweep
low-sweep.effect: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
low-sweep.short_effect: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

simple-beam.name: simple-beam
simple-beam.effect: Changes the target's ability to simple.
simple-beam.short_effect: Changes the target's ability to Simple.

clear-smog.name: clear-smog
clear-smog.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  All of the target's stat modifiers are reset to zero.
clear-smog.short_effect: Removes all of the target's stat modifiers.

karate-chop.name: karate-chop
karate-chop.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
karate-chop.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

meditate.name: meditate
meditate.effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
meditate.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.

smelling-salts.name: smelling-salts
smelling-salts.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
smelling-salts.short_effect: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

bulk-up.name: bulk-up
bulk-up.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.
bulk-up.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by one stage.

close-combat.name: close-combat
close-combat.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
close-combat.short_effect: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

dual-chop.name: dual-chop
dual-chop.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.

power-trip.name: power-trip
power-trip.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user's stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move's power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move's power is 31×.
power-trip.short_effect: Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.

burn-up.name: burn-up
burn-up.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the user's fire type after damage calculation.  If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.
burn-up.short_effect: Removes the user's fire type after inflicting damage.

extreme-speed.name: extreme-speed
extreme-speed.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

iron-head.name: iron-head
iron-head.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
iron-head.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

mind-reader.name: mind-reader
mind-reader.effect:
If the user targets the same target again before the end of the next turn, the move it uses is guaranteed to hit.  This move itself also ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

One-hit KO moves are also guaranteed to hit, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  This effect also allows the user to hit Pokémon that are off the field due to moves such as dig or fly.

If the target uses detect or protect while under the effect of this move, the user is not guaranteed to hit, but has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
mind-reader.short_effect: Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target.

ice-ball.name: ice-ball
ice-ball.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for five turns.  Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends.  If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends.

If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.
ice-ball.short_effect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

circle-throw.name: circle-throw
circle-throw.effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
circle-throw.short_effect: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

darkest-lariat.name: darkest-lariat
darkest-lariat.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.

coaching.name: coaching
coaching.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

barrier.name: barrier
barrier.effect: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
barrier.short_effect: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.

psycho-shift.name: psycho-shift
psycho-shift.effect: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user's status is transferred to the target.
psycho-shift.short_effect: Transfers the user's major status effect to the target.

power-trick.name: power-trick
power-trick.effect:
The user's original Attack and Defense are swapped.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

guard-swap.name: guard-swap
guard-swap.effect: User swaps its Defense and Special Defense modifiers with the target.
guard-swap.short_effect: User swaps Defense and Special Defense changes with the target.

trick-room.name: trick-room
trick-room.effect:
For five turns (including this one), slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.  Move priority is not affected.  Using this move when its effect is already active will end the effect.

Pokémon holding full incense, lagging tail, or quick claw and Pokémon with stall ignore this effect.
trick-room.short_effect: For five turns, slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.

guard-split.name: guard-split
guard-split.effect: Averages the user's unmodified Defense with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
guard-split.short_effect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

psychic-terrain.name: psychic-terrain
psychic-terrain.effect:
Changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain for 5 turns.  Overrides electric terrain, grassy terrain, and misty terrain.

All Pokémon on the ground are immune to moves with priority greater than 0.  (Moves that target the field rather than individual Pokémon, such as spikes, are not affected.)  Additionally, when a Pokémon on the ground uses a psychic-type move, that move's power is increased to 1.5×.

If a Pokémon is holding a Terrain Extender when creating Psychic Terrain (by any means), the effect lasts for 8 turns instead of 5.
psychic-terrain.short_effect: Protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and increases the power of their  Psychic moves by 50%.

recover.name: recover
recover.effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.
recover.short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

kinesis.name: kinesis
kinesis.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
kinesis.short_effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

miracle-eye.name: miracle-eye
miracle-eye.effect: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
miracle-eye.short_effect: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark.

psycho-cut.name: psycho-cut
psycho-cut.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
psycho-cut.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

rolling-kick.name: rolling-kick
rolling-kick.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rolling-kick.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

mach-punch.name: mach-punch
mach-punch.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

vital-throw.name: vital-throw
vital-throw.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

bullet-punch.name: bullet-punch
bullet-punch.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

double-hit.name: double-hit
double-hit.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.

heavy-slam.name: heavy-slam
heavy-slam.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's weight compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User's weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120
heavy-slam.short_effect: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.

wring-out.name: wring-out
wring-out.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
wring-out.short_effect: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.

leaf-blade.name: leaf-blade
leaf-blade.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
leaf-blade.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

leaf-tornado.name: leaf-tornado
leaf-tornado.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
leaf-tornado.short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

aurora-beam.name: aurora-beam
aurora-beam.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.

acupressure.name: acupressure

If the target has a substitute, this move will have no effect, even if the user is the target.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.

explosion.effect: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.

hammer-arm.short_effect: Lowers user's Speed by one stage.

rock-polish.short_effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

steamroller.name: steamroller
steamroller.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.

slack-off.short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

razor-shell.name: razor-shell
razor-shell.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
razor-shell.short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

lock-on.name: lock-on
lock-on.effect:
If the user targets the same target again before the end of the next turn, the move it uses is guaranteed to hit.  This move itself also ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

One-hit KO moves are also guaranteed to hit, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  This effect also allows the user to hit Pokémon that are off the field due to moves such as dig or fly.

If the target uses detect or protect while under the effect of this move, the user is not guaranteed to hit, but has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
lock-on.short_effect: Ensures that the user's next move will hit the target.

metal-sound.name: metal-sound
metal-sound.effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
metal-sound.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

mirror-shot.name: mirror-shot
mirror-shot.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
mirror-shot.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

magnet-bomb.name: magnet-bomb
magnet-bomb.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

steel-beam.name: steel-beam
steel-beam.effect: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up. The user still takes damage if the move is blocked by Protect or Substitute, misses, or if the target has Flash Fire.
steel-beam.short_effect: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up.

trump-card.name: trump-card
trump-card.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power is determined by the PP remaining for this move, after its PP cost is deducted.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

PP remaining | Power
------------ | ----:
4 or more    |    40
3            |    50
2            |    60
1            |    80
0            |   200

If this move is activated by another move, the activating move's PP is used to calculate power.
trump-card.short_effect: Power increases when this move has less PP, up to a maximum of 200.

first-impression.name: first-impression
first-impression.effect: Inflicts regular damage. Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the field.
first-impression.short_effect: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.

jump-kick.name: jump-kick
jump-kick.effect:
Inflicts regular damage. If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP rounded down.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
jump-kick.short_effect: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.

lick.name: lick
lick.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
lick.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

perish-song.name: perish-song
perish-song.effect:
Every Pokémon is given a counter that starts at 3 and decreases by 1 at the end of every turn, including this one.  When a Pokémon's counter reaches zero, that Pokémon faints.  A Pokémon that leaves the field will lose its counter; its replacement does not inherit the effect, and other Pokémon's counters remain.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
perish-song.short_effect: User and target both faint after three turns.

icicle-spear.name: icicle-spear
icicle-spear.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

ice-shard.name: ice-shard
ice-shard.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

entrainment.name: entrainment
entrainment.effect: Changes the target's ability to match the user's.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
entrainment.short_effect: Copies the user's ability onto the target.

triple-axel.name: triple-axel
triple-axel.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

sheer-cold.name: sheer-cold
sheer-cold.effect:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.

frost-breath.name: frost-breath
frost-breath.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.

smog.name: smog
smog.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 40% chance to poison the target.
smog.short_effect: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.

shadow-punch.name: shadow-punch

shadow-sneak.name: shadow-sneak

clamp.name: clamp
clamp.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
clamp.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
destiny-bond.short_effect: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

This effect applies before any other persistent changes to unmodified Attack or Special Attack, such as flower gift during sunny day.
power-split.short_effect: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

camouflage.name: camouflage

User's type changes according to the terrain.

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Building       | normal
Cave           | rock
Desert         | ground
Grass          | grass
Mountain       | rock
Ocean          | water
Pond           | water
Road           | ground
Snow           | ice
Tall grass     | grass

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Courtyard      | normal
Crystal        | rock
Gateway        | water
Magma          | rock
Main Street    | normal
Neon           | normal
Stargazer      | rock
Sunny Park     | grass
Sunset         | ground
Waterfall      | grass

Any regular damage dealt to an affected Pokémon is reduced by ½.  (If there are multiple Pokémon on the affected field, the reduction is ⅓.)
aurora-veil.short_effect: Reduces damage five turns, but must be used during hail.

lava-plume.name: lava-plume
lava-plume.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

sparkling-aria.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.

transform.name: transform
transform.effect:
User copies the target's species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves.  Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining.  IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated.

choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.
transform.short_effect: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.

sharpen.effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.

conversion.name: conversion

conversion.short_effect: User's type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.

conversion-2.name: conversion-2
conversion-2.effect: Changes the user's type to a type either resistant or immune to the last damaging move that hit it.  The new type is selected at random and cannot be a type the user already is.  If there is no eligible new type, this move will fail.
conversion-2.short_effect: Changes the user's type to a random type either resistant or immune to the last move used against it.

draco-meteor.name: draco-meteor

psystrike.short_effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

eruption.name: eruption

eruption.short_effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.

spider-web.name: spider-web
spider-web.effect:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
spider-web.short_effect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

sticky-web.name: sticky-web
sticky-web.effect:
Shoots a web over the opponents' side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage.

Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected.  rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user's side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
sticky-web.short_effect: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents' Speed by one stage upon switching in.

toxic-thread.short_effect: Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by one stage.

triple-kick.name: triple-kick

skill link does not apply.

No move with this effect can be used against the same target again until after the end of the third turn.

This effect breaks through wonder guard.

If the target is protected by protect or detect on the turn this move is used, this move will fail.  However, the damage on the third turn will break through protection.

The damage is applied at the end of the turn, so it ignores endure and focus sash.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
